Be the first to comment Running of the bull: NYPD wrangles bull after chase A bull on the loose led police on a wild goose chase this morning in New York City.The bull was spotted roaming the streets in the city's Jamaica, Queens, neighborhood, according to ABC's New York station WABC.Police said the bull escaped from a slaughterhouse, WABC reported. "It's exciting," George Clooney said.
